explanations.reason: The paper focuses on evaluating attributes affecting contractors' sustainable productivity management in developing countries using the Balanced Scorecard (BSC) framework. The methodologies mentioned include the Delphi technique, Cronbach's Alpha, Exploratory Factor Analysis, and multiple regression analysis. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or other AI techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The study is grounded in management and construction sector practices rather than computational or data-driven approaches.
